description:
A good flannel is hard to beat. Comfy and laid back, the Set Up Camp flannel is just the thing for setting up the tent, and then kicking back in front of the campfire.

  • Soft cotton flannel feels great and gets even comfier over time
  • Rear buttoned box pleat adds a little taper to the silhouette
  • Dual chest pockets, one with an elasticized key loop
  • Button-up cuffs are easy to roll up when it’s time to get to work
  • Regular fit feels just right
name: The North Face Set Up Camp Flannel - Women's
